trans-unit.source: Used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Usado como um objeto de parâmetro no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> da raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarEventArgs class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: A classe ScrollBarEventArgs é exposta como o `e` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: A classe ScrollBarEventArgs contém as seguintes propriedades:-a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade, que é usada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto que o evento foi gerado for...in</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade obtém o nome da área do gráfico; outras propriedades da área do gráfico também podem ser definidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the scrollbar belongs to, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade, que é usada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto ao qual pertence a barra de rolagem, usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>Propriedades também podem ser definidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A> property, which is used to get the scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A>propriedade, que é usada para obter o botão de barra de rolagem que o usuário final é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A> property, which determines if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control cancels default behavior of the scrollbar button after the code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event completes execution.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>propriedade, que determina se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controle cancela o comportamento padrão do botão de barra de rolagem após o código no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento conclui a execução.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A> property, which represents the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A>propriedade, que representa a posição X do cursor do mouse no momento em que o usuário final clicar o elemento da barra de rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A> property, which represents the Y-position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A>propriedade, que representa a posição Y do cursor do mouse no momento em que o usuário final clicar o elemento da barra de rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified axis, X and Y positions of the mouse cursor, and type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o eixo especificado, posições de X e Y do cursor do mouse e o tipo do botão clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> that contains the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> que contém a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The X position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: A posição X do cursor do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The Y position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: A posição Y do cursor do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do botão clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto ao qual pertence uma barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para:-determinar o tipo de eixo – X, X2, Y ou Y2 — que o evento está sendo gerado, usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -obter e definir propriedades de eixo, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que representa o eixo que pertence a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de botão de barra de rolagem que o usuário final é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and can be used to determine the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>de objeto e pode ser usado para determinar o tipo de botão de barra de rolagem, o usuário final é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que representa o tipo de barra de rolagem botão o usuário final clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto ao qual pertence a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: The ChartArea property can be used to determine the chart area that the scrollbar belongs to by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ChartArea pode ser usada para determinar a área do gráfico que pertence a barra de rolagem, acessando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade também pode ser usada para obter e definir propriedades da área do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to cancel the default behavior of specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um sinalizador que indica se deve cancelar o comportamento padrão de eventos específicos de barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to cancel the default behavior on specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para cancelar o comportamento padrão na barra de rolagem específico de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If you click on a scrollbar button, the default manipulation of the view will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se você clicar em um botão de barra de rolagem, ocorrerá a manipulação de padrão do modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The following list summarizes this default behavior: - If the user clicks the Reset/Zoom button, the previous view will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir resume a esse comportamento padrão:-se o usuário clica no botão de redefinição/Zoom, a exibição anterior será exibida.

trans-unit.source: - If the user clicks in the scrollbar background—that is, not on the scrolling thumb, otherwise known as the tracker— large increments and/or decrements of the scrollbar will occur, with the increment and/or decrement size being determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário clica no plano de fundo da barra de rolagem — ou seja, não no elevador rolagem, também conhecido como o rastreador — forma mais rápida e/ou diminui da barra de rolagem ocorrerá, com o tamanho do incremento de e/ou decremento sendo determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To turn off these default behaviors, set the IsHandled property to `true` after providing custom logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: Para desativar esses comportamentos padrão, defina a propriedade IsHandled `true` depois de fornecer lógica personalizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default behavior of the event should be cancelled, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o comportamento padrão do evento deve ser cancelado, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição X do cursor do mouse no momento em que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the X mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada para obter a posição do mouse X, em pixels, quando o usuário final clica em um elemento de barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada 0,0 representa o canto superior esquerdo do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the X mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição do cursor do mouse X.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A posição é expresso em pixels, com 0,0 sendo o canto superior esquerdo da imagem do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Y position of the mouse cursor at the time the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição Y do cursor do mouse no momento em que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the Y mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada para obter a posição do mouse Y, em pixels, quando o usuário final clica em um elemento de barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada 0,0 representa o canto superior esquerdo do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição Y do cursor do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A posição é expresso em pixels, com 0,0 sendo o canto superior esquerdo da imagem do gráfico.
